text: The 2017 Slovak Cup Final (known as the Slovnaft Cup for sponsorship reasons) was the final match of the 2016–17 Slovak Cup, the 48th season of the top cup competition in Slovak football. The match was played at the NTC Poprad in Poprad on 1 May 2017 between MFK Skalica and ŠK Slovan Bratislava. ==Road to the final== Note: In all results below, the score of the finalist is given first (H: home; A: away). {| width="100%" style="text-align:center" |- valign=top bgcolor=#99ccff !colspan=2 style="width:1*"|MFK Skalica !Round !colspan=2 style="width:1*"|ŠK Slovan Bratislava |- valign=top bgcolor=#c1e0ff |Opponent |Result |bgcolor=#c1e0ff|2016–17 Slovak Cup |Opponent |Result |- |FC Petržalka akadémia |5–1 (A) |bgcolor=#c1e0ff|Second Round |Vranov nad Topľou |0−0 (A) (3–2 p) |- |ŠTK 1914 Šamorín |2−0 (A) |bgcolor=#c1e0ff|Third Round |Tatran Oravské Veselé |6–1 (A) |- |Podbrezová |0−0 (H) (12–11 p) |bgcolor=#c1e0ff|Fourth Round |Slovenské Ďarmoty |3–0 (A) |- |Spartak Myjava |1−0 (H) |bgcolor=#c1e0ff|Round of 16 |Družstevník Veľké Ludince |1–0 (A) |- |MŠK Žilina |3–2 (H) |bgcolor=#c1e0ff|Quarter-finals |AS Trenčín |3–1 (H) |- |FK Poprad |0–1 (A), 2–0 (H) (2–1 agg.) |bgcolor=#c1e0ff|Semi-finals |Zemplín Michalovce |2–1 (A), 1–0 (H) (2–1 agg.) |} ==Match== === Details === \------ {| width=92% |- | | |} \-------- ==References== Category:Slovak Cup Finals Cup Final Slovak Cup Category:May 2017 sports events in Europe
title: 2017 Slovak Cup Final
